body: @grand empress thanks for the charm, now i can get to live without anxious antics

CONGRATULATIONS you've stumbled across a SS tier anti curse charm
Lasts for 20 Manga before 1 day cool down type: permanent item indestructible
Effects:
 protects the user from curses
Transfers Curse Back summoner
Blesses user with good vibes
Blesses user with happy thoughts 
-have a nice day :)
